Name: Piña Colada Bombs
Description: Summer is almost over but we are still dreaming about piña coladas! These piña colada bombs are the perfect poolside treat.
Author: Ivanna Lopez Guajardo

Name: Flaffy Pancakes
Description: This recipe for pancakes makes the most perfect soft and fluffy pancakes. Using ingredients you should already have in your kitchen you can easily make these pancakes from scratch for brunch or breakfast this weekend.
Author: uCreators Team

Name: Heart Crepes
Description: This recipe puts whimsy back into breakfast foods– with a squeeze bottle and a little finesse, you can make your own lace crêpes. You’ll find that this crêpe batter is a little bit more fluid than the traditional recipe.
Author: uCreators Team

Name: Black Been Burgers
Description: These extra easy black bean burgers taste amazing and are ready to eat in about 20 minutes! These bean burgers are dairy, egg, and gluten-free, don’t require any complicated steps, are perfect for making ahead, and will make both the meat-eaters and non-meat eaters in your life happy!
Author: Ivanna Lopez Guajardo

Name: Scalloped Potatoes
Description: Specifically, these scalloped potatoes (which are technically potatoes au gratin). In my humble opinion, they are simply the best. And in the years since I originally posted this recipe here on the blog, thousands of you have also tried them and agreed! So today.
Author: Alvin Zhou. Tasty Team

Name: Bacon Egg Cups
Description: Once baked, these breakfast egg cups have a lovely crispy bacon strip on the outside and are deliciously eggy inside. You will find a bed of wilted spinach at the bottom of each cup that compliments everything else nicely. I love to garnish these with some chives, salt, and pepper.
Author: Alix Traeger. Tasty Team

Name: Cookies and Cream Truffles Easy Dessert
Description: These truffles are so yummy! If you also want to make this, I used the recipe below:
Author: Ivanna Lopez Guajardo

Name: Plant-Based Cheeseburger
Description: The new generation of vegan meat alternatives, such as Impossible and Beyond, are at their best when still medium-rare and juicy. Flipping the patties frequently as they cook ensures an evenly cooked interior and good flavor development on the exterior. To make the burgers vegetarian, feel free to use any good melting cheese, such as American, Cheddar or Swiss, but to make them strictly vegan, be sure to look for vegan burger buns, as standard supermarket burger buns frequently contain milk or other dairy products.
Author: Amy Harriott-Gregory & Chloe Olivia Morgan

Name: Mini Butterfinger Cheesecakes
Description: Summer is almost over but we are still dreaming about piña coladas! These piña colada bombs are the perfect poolside treat.
Author: Presented by Butterfinger

Name: Vegan Ground Beef
Description: This vegan ground beef is super easy to make and can be used as a substitute for meat in many recipes, like tacos, casseroles, soups, and more. High in protein, nut-free, and easily made oil-free.
Author: Karissa's Vegan

Name: Lemon Meringue Pie
Description: Did you know you can make meringue out of... chickpea water!? This plant based version of a classic dessert is egg and dairy-free and is just as delicious as the original!
Author: Amy Harriott-Gregory

Name: Strawberry Cream Bites
Description: Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream Bites Servings: 64 pieces
Author: Tiffany Lo

Name: Meat Cutlets
Description: This recipe has many different names. Depending on the country and culture, people would call it Croquettes, Cutlets, Patties, or Kotleti. Despite various names, they are all cutlet shaped patties made of ground meat, covered with breadcrumbs, and fried on a skillet.
Author: Veronika’s kitchen
